decorator.description: Flags a project's active Terracotta configuration file

decorator.label: Terracotta Server Running
decorator.description: Flags Terracotta Projects which have a running server

decorator.label: Instrumented DSO Module
decorator.description: Flags CompilationUnits whose primary type is instrumented

decorator.label: Instrumented ClassFile
decorator.description: Flags ClassFiles whose primary type is instrumented

decorator.label: Excluded DSO Module
decorator.description: Flags CompilationUnits whose primary type is excluded from instrumented

decorator.description: Flags classes that are excluded from instrumented

decorator.label: DSO Root
decorator.description: Flags Fields that are DSO Roots

decorator.label: Transient field
decorator.description: Flags Fields that are not to be shared as DSO objects

decorator.label: DSO Named Lock
decorator.description: Flags methods that are DSO named distributed-lock methods

decorator.label: DSO Autolock
decorator.description: Flags methods that are DSO automatic distributed-lock methods

decorator.label: DSO Distributed Method
decorator.description: Flags methods that are DSO distributed methods
